Maria is a 52-years- old and is married with two children. She has been a working for 26 years as a baker. A trade she learned one day when her lady friend was baking and invited her to work with her in making bread. That's how she learned slowly until one day decided to open her own bakery.

She travels by bus to the city, about seven miles from home, in order to buy all the supplies you need to make bread.

The loan is asking from Field Foundation, is to buy flour, eggs, yeast, sugar, butter, trays to place the bread, and other materials. Currently what she is working with is almost useless. With the investment, she will buy utensils used in the bakery. Additionally, she has to buy more inputs to increase production, taking advantage of the fact that she has a lot of demand for bread.

Her purpose is, first of all to repay the loan and still have the support of the institution. She also wants to improve your home, because it needs maintenance and that requires investment. Lastly and most importantly she wants her bakery to grow faster than ever, as it is her only source of income.

loans.use: to purchase flour, eggs, yeast, sugar, butter, trays to place the bread, and other materials, because nowadays her items are almost useless

loans.name: Richard

texts.en:
Richard is a married man with children who still attend school and are still under his care. They live at their own house that has neither electricity nor piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

He operates a clothes-selling business and sells at the market to his town dwellers and his neighbours. He cites his major challenge to be the rate of stock turnover which is affected by seasons. 

With the loan he is requesting, he wants to purchase one bale of clothes for resale. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase one bale of clothes for resale.

loans.name: Nijmeh

texts.en:
Nijmeh is a 46-year-old widowed mother of two children. Sixteen years ago, Nijmeh's life turned upside down when her husband passed away, leaving her with two little children to take good care of. Since that time, Nijmeh is running her convenience store in a well-managed way to make sure that their only source of income will suffice to cover her family's increasing needs. Both children are enrolled in a private school, thus her expenses are very high. She is giving her best effort to continue managing her business and family's needs.
Despite her special business talents, Nijmeh still needs an external financial support to expand her business and diversify her products.
That's why she requested a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua, to increase her merchandise and capital with special, cold summer beverages and Holy month of Ramadan requested Dates.
She hopes that one day she can expand her store to a supermarket that can cover almost all of her customers' needs and requests.

loans.use: to increase her merchandise and capital with special, cold summer beverages and Holy month of Ramadan requested Dates.

loans.name: Zhora

texts.en:
Zhora is young, but already the owner of a private business, which he manages perfectly and has a lot of loyal customers. Zhora lives in Stepanavan, which is a city in the region of Lori. He has graduated from Stepanavan Agricultural College's Faculty of Agricultural Management. He lives with his parents in their private home, near which he has separated a small space where he has built a little workshop for his car services activities. He is a jack of all trades: repairing of car tires, tire balancing, reconstructing tires and also solving all the problems and disorders connected with cars in general. He has been engaged in this business for three years and his father helps him very much.
It is Zhora’s first time dealing with Kiva, and he needs this loan in order to buy a lot of tires, since in addition to all of the services that he provides, he wants to start selling car tires.

loans.use: to buy a lot of tires for resale.

loans.name: Dorcas

texts.en:
Dorcas is married with three children, two of whom attend school, while the other is an infant. Her husband is a driver and he supports his family financially. They live in their own home that has electricity, but not piped water. 

She operates a farming  business, selling farm products at the market to her neighbors and passersby. She faces a major challenge of competition from other farm products sellers in her business. 

With Kshs 10,000 she wants to purchase 10 kg of fertilizer and seeds to plant. She dreams of expanding  her business to earn more income in the future.

loans.use: to purchase 10 kg of fertilizer and seeds to plant.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: purchase a variety of products such as sugar, toilet paper, sardines, oil, beans, tuna, onions, tomatoes, and other items.

loans.name: Bewe

texts.en:
Bewe is 33 years old and lives in West point area, which has the most populated market in Montserrado County.  Bewe described herself as a hardworking person who completed ninth grade. 

Bewe lives with her fiancee who sells food stuff.  Due to financial problem, she decided to established a business.  For the past four years she has been buying and selling palm oil and plantains.  She like her business because of the way customers buy from her.  She started this business with money given to her by her fiancee. 

Most of the time Bewe uses a taxi to get her goods at to the place where she sells her goods.

She is requesting a loan to purchase more palm oil and plantains.  Bewe plans to buy a pieces of land and build a house with the profits.  

Bewe says thanks to the lenders who support BRAC Liberia because it will enable her to increase her business volume.

loans.use: to purchase palm oil and plantains.

loans.name: Christina Group

texts.en:
"Christina" is a group composed of three Filipino ladies who work as housekeepers for Lebanese families.  They decided to join hands and form the group in order to support each other financially. 

Severa (center in photo) is the leader of the group.  She is a 55 year-old married mother of two children.  Her husband is Lebanese but is currently unemployed, which means that she is the only financial provider for the family.  Her family depends upon her income to cover expenses and to pay school fees. 

Severa decided to contact Al Majmoua and inquire about getting a loan to settle the tuition fees of her children.

As for the other group members,  Floredeliza is standing on the far left of the photo and Maricel is standing on the right.

loans.use: to pay tuition fees of her children.

loans.name: Robert

texts.en:
Robert is a 46 year-old married father of two children.  He owns a small beauty salon for women, and has been working in this field for 26 years now. 

His wife is employed as a dental assistant which is a relatively low-income job.  His children are enrolled in a private school, which means that Robert and his wife have to cover the tuition fees on top of the family's other expenses. 

Robert decided to contact Al Majmoua and acquire a loan in order to purchase a new salon work kit for his business.  The loan will also pay tuition fees of his children.

loans.use: to purchase a new salon work kit and pay school fees.

loans.name: Juan Neptali

texts.es:
JUAN tiene 20 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos viove con la mamá en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC CEVALLOS , se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco. Pertenece a la parroquia San Juan Pueblo viejo se dedican a labores afrícolas.

Juan se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, soya. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, fertilizantes, insecticidas, herbicidas. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesaruio para la agricultura. Las compras las realizará en Ventanas.

 El sueño es seguir mejorando en los cultivos.
Los desafíos a los que se enfrenta es la competencia.
En el tiempo libre le gusta jugar futbool.
texts.en: Juan is 20 years old.  He is single and doesn’t have children.  He lives with his mother in the Ventanas canton, Los Ríos province.  He is a member of the “Cevallos” Communal Bank, located in the San Francisco precinct, which belongs to the “San Juan Pueblo Viejo” parish, an area dedicated to farming.  Juan is engaged in farming, planting corn and soy.  He is requesting the loan to purchase seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, and herbicides.  With the help of the loan, he will be able to purchase what he needs for farming.  He makes his purchases in Ventanas.  His dream is to continue improving his crops.  The challenge he faces is the competition.  He plays soccer in his free time.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, fertilizer, insecticides, and herbicides.

loans.name: Jesus Deliva

texts.es:
Jesús es soltera tiene 59 años de edad es madre soltera tiene una hija, vive con la hija en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

Es integrante de la VRC Cevallos, se encuentra ubicada en el Recinto San Francisco, Pertenece a la Parroquia San Juan del Pueblo viejo se dedican a labores agrícolas.

Jesús se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, arroz. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, insecticidas, fertilizantes. Con la ayuda del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. Las compras y ventas las realiza en Ventanas

Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuente es la competencia y las plagas. El sueño es pasar junto a la familia.

En los tiempos libres le gusta salir a pasear con la hija por el pueblo.
texts.en: Jesús is a 59 year old single mother. She has a daughter and lives with her in Ventanas canton, los Ríos province.  She is a member of the “Cevallos” Communal Bank, located in the San Francisco precinct, which belongs to the “San Juan Pueblo Viejo” parish, an area dedicated to farming.  Jesús is engaged in farming, planting corn and rice.  She is requesting the loan to purchase seeds, urea, insecticides, and fertilizer.  With the help of the loan, she will be able to purchase what she needs for farming.  She makes her purchases in Ventanas.  She frequently faces the challenges of competition and blight.  Her dream is to spend time with her family.  In her free time, she enjoys going for walks through the village with her daughter.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, insecticides, and fertilizer.

loans.name: Josephine

texts.en:
Josephine lives in Teshie, Ghana.  She sells plastic products from door to door.  This has been her business for the last few year. 

The 36-year-old mother of two is married and owns rental houses, which provides her with extra income.  Josephine has a vision to open a restaurant in the future.  The challenges that she faces include competition and financing her business. 

The profit that Josephine makes will enable her to give her children the best education in the country.  She is asking for a loan of GHS 1000 to purchase bowls, cups and food flasks and sell to customers.

loans.use: bowls, cups and food flasks.

loans.name: Kaveni

texts.en:
Kaveni owns a house that doesn't have electricity or piped water.  Her greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

She has operated a retail shop for the past three years, selling household consumables like wheat and maize flour from home to her neighbors.  Kaveni faces a challenge of high cost of transportation. 

With a Kshs 50,000 loan she wants to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and cooking oil.  Kaveni dreams of opening a wholesale shop in the future.

loans.use: to purchase bundles of wheat flour, maize flour and cooking oil.

loans.name: Natividad De Los Angeles

texts.es:
Natividad, es una persona mayor de edad, vive con su esposa y sus cuatro hijos, los cuales tienen edades de 12, 16, 20 y 22 años de edad. El, se dedica al cultivo de granos básicos  tales como maíz y frijol, asimismo a la ganadería, todos los miembros del hogar trabajan en la misma actividad, este oficio lo aprendió de su familia.
El préstamo que requiere le permitirá comprar los insumos agrícolas necesarios tales como: abono, fertilizantes y venenos; esta inversión le ayudara a obtener una mejor cosecha y mayores ganancias.
Su sueño es adquirir un terreno para tener más ganado y cultivar en lo propio.
texts.en:
Natividad is a senior citizen and lives with his wife and four children. His children are the following ages 12, 16, 20 and 22 years old. He works in the cultivation of basic grains such as corn and beans. He also works with livestock. All of the members of his household work in the same activity. He learned this trade from his family.

The loan that he is requesting will allow him to purchase requiring necessary agricultural inputs such as manure, fertilizers and pesticides. This investment will help him to get a better harvest and higher profits.

His dream is to buy land for more cattle and grow himself.

loans.use: to purchase manure, fertilizer, and pesticides/

loans.name: Dúo Solidario Rios De Bendicion Group

texts.es:
Dúo Solidario Rios de Bendicion
Este grupo esta conformado por la señora Estelita de 24 años de edad es soltera y se dedica a la venta de cosmeticos en general ella se dedica a esta actividad desde hace 3 años, ya que el negocio es una buena oportunidad para superarse no solo ella si no tambien su familia, esta solicitando este credito para la comra de cosmeticos en general ya que su negocio requiere de mas capital porque dia con dia ba creciendo espera que kiva le pueda ayudar con el credito solicitado ya que sera de mucha ayuda para ella y su negocio.
texts.en:
“Dúo Solidario Rios de Bendicion “ (Solidarity Duo of Blessed River)
This group is comprised of Estelita who is 24-years-old, is single,  and works in the sale of cosmetics. In general she has worked in this activity for three years. The business is a good opportunity to not only get ahead, but to get her family ahead.

She is requesting this loan to buy general cosmetics since her business requires more capital because day by day her business is growing. Kiva can help with the requested credit because it will be very helpful to her and her business.

loans.use: to buy general cosmetics

loans.name: Monica Isabel

texts.es:
Mónica tiene 33 años vive en unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con la pareja y con el hijo en el Cantón ventanas provincia de los ríos.

VRC CEVALLOS, SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO SAN FRANCISCO, PERTENECE A LA PARROQUIA SAN JUAN DE PUEBLO VIEJO SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS. 

Mónica se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz y soya, además se dedica a la crianza de animales como gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para compra semillas, insecticidas, fertilizantes.

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. El sueño es tener un negocio propio. El desafío al que se enfrenta es la competencia. En el tiempo libre se dedica a sus animales.
texts.en:
Monica is 33-years-old , is living with her partner, and has a son. The couples lives with the child in in the Canton Ventanas province of the rivers. Cevallos, is located on the campus San Francisco and belongs to the parish of old town of  San Juan. This area is dedicated to farm work.

Monica works in agriculture, harvesting corn and soybeans. She also works raising animals such as chickens and pigs,. She is requesting the credit to buy seeds, insecticides, and fertilizers.

With the support of the loan she will be able to buy supplies for agricultural business. Her dream is to have her own business. The challenge she faces is competition. During her free time she tends to her animals.

loans.use: to buy seeds, insecticides, and fertilizers.

loans.name: Karen Consuelo

texts.es:
Karen es una joven trabajadora de 21 años de edad, acompañada y madre de un hijo. Trabaja en una farmacia de la ciudad. Terminando su bachillerato hace aproximadamente dos años le dieron la oportunidad de trabajar ahí, mostrando buenas cualidades de servicio y atención al cliente. Experiencia en venta de productos farmacéuticos no tenia, pero por sus propios deseos de superación la llevaron a ganarse un lugar de trabajo en dicha farmacia.

El préstamo sera utilizado para comprar cemento, arena, hierro, para construir nuevos soportes para su vivienda; ya que actualmente se encuentra en condiciones que peligran la vida de ella y de su familia ya que los soportes que sostienen el techo se encuentran deteriorados.

Así, mejora la infraestructura de su casa, ya que se encuentra en condiciones de peligro de que se caiga. Lo que siempre,  es poder tener un negocio propio, pero sabe que solo con su trabajo diario podrá verlo cumplido, por eso se esmera en luchar cada día por lograr sus sueño. También desea cancelar el préstamo y poder seguir teniendo la ayuda a nuevos créditos.
texts.en:
Karen is a young 21 years of age. She has a partner and is the mother of a son. She works in a pharmacy in the city. Finishing her high school degree about two years ago she was given the opportunity to work there. She has shown good qualities of customer service and attention to clients. She did not have experience in pharmaceutical sales, but by her own desire to succeed she as able to earn a job to working in the pharmacy.

The loan will be used to purchase cement, sand, iron, in order to build new brackets for her home.  Currently her home is in a condition that endangers her life and the lives of her family members.  The brackets supporting the roof are impaired.

She needs to improve the infrastructure of her home as it is in a position of danger of falling. She always wants to have her own business, but knows that only with daily work she can complete this goal.  For this reason she strives every day to achieve your dream. Also want to repay the loan and to continue taking the help to new credit.

loans.use: to purchase cement, sand, iron, in order to build new foundation for her home

loans.name: Maria De La Cruz

texts.es:
María tiene 43 años de edad es soltera no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en el Cantón ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

VRC CEVALLOS, SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO SAN FRANCISCO, PERTENECE A LA PARROQUIA SAN JUAN DE PUEBLO VIEJO SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS.

María se dedica a la agricultura  a la siembra de arroz, maíz, además se dedica a la cría de gallinas. Solicita el crédito para comprar semillas, urea, fertilizantes, insecticidas y alimento para los animales.

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar lo necesario para la agricultura. Las compras las realizará en Ventanas.

El sueño es seguir mejorando el negocio de ropa. El desafío al que se enfrenta es la competencia y las plagas.
texts.en:
Maria, 43, is single and has no children. She lives with her parents in Ventanas Canton, in the province of Los Ríos. Cevallos communal bank is located in the San Francisco neighbourhood, and belongs to the San Juan de Pueblo Viejo parish. Its members work in agriculture. 

Maria works in agriculture, sowing rice and corn, and also raises chickens. She is requesting credit to buy seeds, urea, fertilizer, pesticide, and animal feed. With the support provided by this loan, she will be able to purchase what she needs for her farm. She will make her purchases in Ventanas. 

Her dream is to continue improving her clothing business. The challenges that she faces are competition and pests.

loans.use: to purchase seeds, urea, fertilizer, pesticide, and animal feed

loans.name: Gufronjon

texts.ru: Гуфрончон проживает на севере страны, в городе Исфара. Ему 30 лет. Он женатый человек, но еще детей не имеет. Его жена домохозяйка и Гуфрончон сам обеспечивает семью. С ними также живут его мать и младший брат. Гуфрончон зарабатывает на жизнь занимаясь продажей сушеных абрикосов. Он каждый год у садоводов покупает урожай абрикосов. Гуфрончон сам вместе с семьей собирает абрикосы с деревьев потому что так им дешевле обходится, затем они сушат их на солнце и после этого они выводят сушеных абрикосов на рынок на продажу. Это является их семейным бизнесом, Гуфрончон продолжает дело своего прадеда. Сейчас Гуфрончон нуждается в кредите. Он просит кредит для закупа урожая абрикоса с целью сушения и продажи. Благодаря кредиту Гуфрончон сможет продолжить свою деятельность.
texts.en:
Gufronjon lives in the north of the country, in the town of Isfara. He is 30 years old. He is married but does not have kids yet. His wife is a housewife and Gufronjon single-handedly supports the family. His mom and his younger brother also live with them. 

Gufronjon makes a living by selling dried apricots. Every year, he buys apricot harvests from farmers. Gufronjon and his family pick the apricots from trees themselves because it is cheaper to do so, and then they dry the apricots in the sun and take the dried apricots to the market for sale. This is their family's business. Gufronjon is continuing the work of his great grandfather. 

Now, Gufronjon is in  need of a loan. He is requesting a loan to purchase an apricot harvest to dry and sell. Thanks to the loan, Gufronjon will be able to continue his business.

loans.use: to purchase, dry and resell an apricot harvest

loans.name: Clara Agripina

texts.es:
Clara tiene 41 años de edad de estado civil unión libre tiene cinco hijos vive en el Cantón Ventanas Provincia de los Ríos.

VRC CEVALLOS, SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO SAN FRANCISCO, PERTENECE A LA PARROQUIA SAN JUAN DE PUEBLO VIEJO SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS.

Clara  se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, soya, además a la crianza de gallinas y cerdos. Solicita el crédito para compra lo necesario para las siembras, además comprar pollos, cerdos y alimento de crianza y engorde.

Con el apoyo del crédito podrá comprar lo necesartio para los cultivos. El sueño es contar con salud y dinero. El desafío al que se enfrenta es seguir trabajando para salir adelante.

En su tiempo libre se dedica a descansar.
texts.en:
Clara is 41 years old. She lives in a common-law relationship and has five children. She lives in the Ventanas department of Los Rios province. The Cevallos communal bank is located in the small town of San Francisco, which belongs to the San Juan de Pueblo Viejo parish. The members work in agriculture.

Clara works in agriculture, growing corn and soybeans in addition to raising chickens and pigs. She is seeking this loan in order to buy supplies that are needed for her crops, as well as to buy chickens and pigs, and food to raise and fatten them.

With the support of the loan she will buy supplies that are needed for the crops. Her dream is to have good health and money. The challenge that she faces is to continue working to get ahead. In her free time she rests.

loans.use: to buy supplies that are needed for her crops, as well as to buy chickens and pigs, and feed to raise and fatten them.

loans.name: José Antonio

texts.es: José Antonio, tiene la edad de 62 años, es soltero, no tiene hijos  y vive con un hermano. El quiere comprar abono y pagar mano de obra para asistir café que tiene sembrado en su finca.   Tiene varios años que se dedica a su finca y quiere crecer y también desea que su finca sea muy productiva. Es el primer  préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. No  ha realizado otros préstamos en bancos estatales o Cooperativas, pero FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja.También tiene el deseo de que su hermano y él tengan un mejor nivel de vida, aumentando los ingresos.
texts.en: José Antonio is 62 years old. He is single and has no children. He lives with a brother. He wants to buy compost and pay for labor to help with the coffee that he has growing on his farm. He has worked on his farm for a number of years, and he wants to grow and also wants his farm to be more productive. This is the first loan that he has received from FUDECOSUR. He has not had other loans from state or cooperative banks, but FUDECOSUR offered him the loan with better payment terms and the interest rate is much lower. He also wants his brother and himself to have a better standard of living, increasing his income.

loans.use: to buy compost and pay for labor to hep with his coffee crop

loans.name: Wilson Agustin

texts.es:
Wilson  tiene 46 años de estdao civil unión libre no tiene hijos, vive con la esposa en el cantón ventanas provincia de los Ríos.

VRC CEVALLOS, SE ENCUENTRA UBICADA EN EL RECINTO SAN FRANCISCO, PERTENECE A LA PARROQUIA SAN JUAN DE PUEBLO VIEJO SE DEDICAN A LABORES AGRICOLAS.

Wilson  se dedica a la agricultura a la crianza de cerdos, pollos. Solicita el crédito para comprar pollos, cerdos, patos y alimento para los animales.Con el apoyo del crédito va incrementar su negocio.

El sueño es seguir mejorando el negocio para que haya más utilidad. El desafío al que se enfrenta es la competencia y el mal clima. En su tiempo libre le gusta hacer deporte.
texts.en:
Wilson is 46 years old and is in a common-law marriage with no children. He lives with his wife in Ventanas canton, in the province of Los Ríos. 

Cevallos communal bank is located in Recinto San Francisco and belongs to the San Juan de Pueblo Viejo parish. Its members are engaged in agriculture. 

Wilson works in agriculture, raising pigs and chickens. He is requesting a loan to purchase chickens, pigs, ducks, and animal feed. With the support of this loan, he will build up his business.

His dream is to continue improving his business so that it is more profitable. The challenges he faces are competition and bad weather. In his free time he likes to play sports.

loans.use: to purchase chickens, pigs, ducks, and animal feed

loans.name: Dioun Fre Group

texts.fr: Groupement à caractère masculin, Tous dans l’agriculture et plus précisément dans la culture du maïs, sollicite son quatrième crédit pour acheter des outils de travail. Le profit tiré de la vente les aideront à assurer un meilleur avenir à la famille et augmenter la superficie cultivable. Notons que mr Komla âgé de 49ans  a été nommé par les autres membres pour être le responsable de ce groupement. Il est marié et père de famille. Démarré en 1980 en RÉGION CENTRALE, il espère avoir un bon rendement et assurer un avenir meilleur à la famille.
texts.en: A male group with members all in agriculture, that is, corn farming to be exact, is requesting its fourth loan to purchase work tools. The profits earned from the sales will help to ensure a better future for the family and to expand arable land. To note, Mr. Komla is 49 years old and has been named by the other members to be the group's official. He is a married father. Having started off in 1980 in RÉGION CENTRALE, he hopes to have a good yield and to ensure a better future for his family.

loans.use: to purchase work tools

loans.name: Noel De Jesus

texts.es:
Noel, tiene 49 años de edad, vive solo, ya que nació en Nicaragua pero hoy en día reside en EL Salvador. El, posee una taller de carpintería y artesanías de madera, este oficio lo aprendió de su padre  lo realiza a tiempo completa, cuenta con 25 años de experiencia.
El préstamo que solicita le permitirá comprar madera para iniciar con la artesanía; esta inversión le ayudara a incrementar sus ingresos.
Su sueño es ampliar el taller y  adquirir equipo necesario para aumentar la producción.
texts.en:
Noel is 49 years old. He lives alone. He was born in Nicaragua but now he lives in El Salvador. He has a workshop for carpentry and wood handicrafts. He learned this trade from his father and he does it full time. He has 25 years of experience.

The loan that he is applying for will allow him to buy wood to begin making handicrafts. This investment will help him increase his income.

His dream is to expand his workshop and acquire the equipment necessary to increase production.

loans.use: to buy wood to begin making handicrafts

loans.name: Salomón

texts.es:
Salomón tiene 38 años de edad, es soltero, vive junto a su mamá. Es una persona que tiene varios años de dedicarse a la sastrería; oficio que aprendió de su madre. Se levanta a las 6:00 a.m. Junto a su madre para limpiar la tienda que poseen y el taller de sastrería. Él compra la mercadería (carne, pollo,  verduras, lácteos, golosinas, etc.) en la ciudad que esta a 8 Kilómetros y compra  en el mercado municipal donde le sale mas barato.

Hoy en día, esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar lamina, cemento, arena para reparar el techo de su vivienda y ampliarla para que sus clientes de sientan cómodos cuando lleguen a comprar a la tienda o al taller de sastrería, debido a que se encuentra en malas condiciones y los ingresos que obtiene no le son suficientes para repararlo por cuenta propia. Con el mejoramiento de su vivienda podrán atraer más clientes para su negocio lo que le generara mejores ingresos para el sustento de su familia

Salomón, planea en un futuro construir su vivienda de ladrillo ya que actualmente es de madera.
texts.en:
Salomón is 38 years old, single, and he lives with his mother. He has has spent several years working as a tailor, a trade he learned from his mother. He gets up at 6:00 a.m. so that and his mother clean the store and the tailoring workshop they own. 

Salomón buys the merchandise (meat, chicken, vegetables, dairy products, sweets, etc.) in the city which is 8 kilometers away in the city market where it is less expensive. 

Now he is asking for a loan from Fundación Campo to purchase metal sheets, cement and sand to repair the roof of his home, and to expand it so that his clients feel comfortable when they shop in the store or the tailoring workshop, since it is in poor condition, and he doesn't earn enough income to repair it on his own. 

With the improvement of his dwelling, the store will attract more clients for his business, which will generate more income to support his family.

In the future, Salomón plans on building a brick home since he currently lives in one made of wood.

loans.use: purchase sheet metal, cement, and sand to repair the roof of his home and to expand it so that clients feel comfortable when they shop at his store or tailoring workshop, which are currently in poor condition.

loans.name: Anonymous Group
loans.use: to purchase work tools

loans.name: Ali

texts.ru: Али пожилой и очень трудолюбивый мужчина в возрасте 52 лет. Он женат и имеет четверо детей. Али живёт в большом посёлке. Жена Али домохозяйка, она занимается воспитанием детей, а также у неё много работы по дому. Старший сын Али работает мастером в мебельном цеху, там он получает небольшую заработную плату, но это очень помогает  их семье, является дополнительным доходом. Сам Али занимается купля продажей. Он продает разную национальную посуду и хозяйственные наборы. Этим делом он занимается уже более  7 лет и его товар пользуется большим спросом. У него уже есть постоянные клиенты, которые покупают его  товар в виде подарков на разные национальные мероприятия. Этот бизнес приносит Али хороший и стабильный доход. Так как этот бизнес основной доход в семье, Али хочет расширить свой товарооборот. И для этого он обратился в Арванд, чтобы получить кредит для покупки больше товара, а именно посуды для дальнейшей реализации. Али надеется на положительный результат и заранее благодарит Арванд за поддержку.
texts.en:
Ali is an elderly and very hard-working 52-year-old man. He is married and has four children. Ali lives in a large village. Ali's wife is a housewife.  She raises the kids and does a lot of work around the house. Ali's oldest son works as a foreman in a furniture shop. Though he earns a modest income, it significantly helps the family in terms of additional income.

Ali is in the business of buying and selling goods. He sells various national tableware and sets of household goods. He has been in the business for over seven years, and his products are in great demand. He already has loyal clients, who buy his goods as gifts for various national events. This business provides Ali with a good and stable income.

Since the business is the primary source of income for the family, Ali wants to grow his sales. To achieve this, he asked Arvand for a loan to purchase additional products, specifically, tableware for resale.  Ali hopes for a positive outcome and is thankful in advance for Arvand's support.

loans.use: to buy tableware

loans.name: José Efraín

texts.es:
José tiene 37 años de edad, es casado y tiene tres hijos.  Es una persona que tiene varios años de dedicarse a la agricultura, oficio que aprendió de sus  padres. Se levanta a las 5:00 a.m. para prepararse junto a su esposa e hijos para ir a las parcelas donde cultivan y luego se dedica a prestar sus servicios como vigilante en una finca. Compra los insumos como: el veneno, el abono, la semilla, etc. en la ciudad,  para llegar ahí tiene que abordar un autobús para ello camina a pie por unas veredas unos 8 kilómetros hasta llegar al punto en donde lo aborda.

Él esta diversificando, sus trabajos agrícolas, ya que además de los cultivos desea instalar una porqueriza. Es por esa razón que esta solicitando un préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar 10 cerdos pequeños e iniciar el comercio de estos para obtener mejores ingresos para el sustento de su familia y dedicarse  completamente al comercio y a la crianza de cerdos.

José planea en un futuro poder construir una vivienda digna para su familia ya que en la que actualmente residen es de lámina.
texts.en:
José is 37 years old. He is married and has three children. He is a person who has a number of years of working in agriculture, work that he learned from his parents. He gets up at 5:00 am to get ready, along with his wife and children, to go to the parcels of land that he cultivates, and then he provides his services as a watchman at a farm. He buys his supplies such as poison, compost, seeds, etc., in the city. To go there he needs to take a bus, and for that he walks along some paths for 8 kilometers to arrive at the place where he boards the bus.

He is diversifying his agricultural work, since in addition to his crops he wants to set up a pig farm. This is why he is applying to Fundación Campo for a loan, to buy 10 little pigs and begin a business with them to obtain better earnings to support his family and dedicate himself completely to business and to raising pigs.

In the future, José plans to build a worthy home for his family, since the one in which they now live is made of metal sheeting.

loans.use: to buy 10 little pigs and begin a business with them

loans.name: Anwbene Ii Group

texts.fr:
Les dix  membres du groupe ANWBENE II sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 41 ans et ont en moyenne 5 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Kokougrou un des villages de la commune de Guégnaka,  préfecture de Dioïla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont l’arachide, du mil et du haricot. Elles sont à leur septième  collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt,  Assitan la deuxième personne à droite dans le rang des debout, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 1 ha de mil et d’arachide 
Les productions sont vendues au niveau de la ville de Fana, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle réalise un bénéfice moyen de 95 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The ten members of the group "ANWBENE II" are married women, who average 41 years of age and five children each. The women live for the most part in polygamous families in Kokougrou, a village in Commune de Guégnaka, Préfecture de Dioïla, in Région de Koulikoro (2nd administrative region of the Republic of Mali). The women are collaborating with the microfinance institution Soro Yiriwaso with the goal of better organizing their work at the start of the rainy season. And they are on their seventh collaboration with the institution. The crops grown are peanuts, millet, and beans.

With this loan, Assitan, who is the second person standing from the right in the photo, intends to purchase farm inputs and sundry equipment and to cover the cost of plowing to maintain 1 hectare of millet and peanuts. 

After the harvest, the produce is sold in Fana City to men and women customers. She hopes to make an average profit of about 95,000 francs CFA per planting.

loans.use: to pay for plowing, weeding, seeds, herbicide, and sundry equipment

loans.name: Jorge

texts.es:
Jorge es de la ciudad de Encarnación, esta estudiando la carrera de Contabilidad publica, lo cual le permitirá el día de mañana ser un gran profesional. Comenta que lo que le inspira a seguir sus estudios es la voluntad que tiene de poder ayudar a los demás y servir a su comunidad.
Lo que lo destaca de las demás personas es su dedicación y las ganas que pone a sus estudios para poder ir creciendo y mejorando. solicita de esta ayuda para poder invertirlo en el pago de sus clases, lo cual le permitirá seguir estudiando y mejorando día a día.
texts.en:
Jorge is from the city of Encarnación. He is studying for a degree in Public Accounting, which will allow him to someday become a successful professional. Jorge says that he is inspired to continue his studies because of his desire to help others and serve his community.

What sets him apart from other people is his dedication and his willingness to make his studies a priority so that he can keep growing and improving. Jorge is requesting assistance so that he can invest in the payment of his classes. As a result, he can keep studying and improving each day.

loans.use: to pay for his university classes.

loans.name: Mario

texts.en:
Mario is a 44-year-old married father of two children, who has worked for 25 years in baking and selling Holy bread in Northern Lebanon. He is well known in his region for the special taste served and special quality he produces.

Mario is applying for a loan from Kiva's partner Al Majmoua in order to increase his business merchandise with special requested flour, oil and other needed materials. This loan will help him buy these materials at decreased prices and increase his production, so as to serve more customers and cover wider regions.

Mario is hoping to open a wider developed bakery in the future.

loans.use: to increase his business merchandise with special requested flour, oil and other needed materials

loans.name: Vazgen

texts.en:
Vazgen lives in Kapan with his wife, who is unemployed, and three children. His son works in a military unit and his two daughters are already married and they live separately with their families. For fifteen years Vazgen has owned a business selling construction and repairing products and other small items connected with it. He mentions that the income is not constant, but nevertheless he manages to pay the rent for his stall, to bring the needed products from Yerevan wholesale markets once a month and barely to cover the needs of his family. Vazgen’s stall is well known around the city, since whatever you need you can surely find in his stall.

The loan amount that Vazgen asks from Kiva lenders is needed for the purchase of a new batch of goods for his stall.

loans.use: to purchase a new batch of construction and repairing products for his stall

loans.name: Jaber

texts.en: Jaber is a 45-year-old married father of four children. He is a Palestinian refugee, living in a Palestinian camp in the South of Lebanon. Palestinians in Lebanon are a marginalized segment of the population since they are restricted to a specific range of low-income jobs, and are often discriminated against. Furthermore, because of the dire situation of Palestinians in Lebanon, Jaber did not receive an education when he was a child, which is why he is illiterate, a great handicap in his life. However, trying to overcome these difficulties, Jaber became a fisherman. Later on he discovered that his revenue did not suffice to provide for a family of six members, which is why he also decided to work in the field of selling furniture. He used to work in pasting tiles before too.  His wife is unemployed, which means that he is the only financial provider of the family. Thus, in order to increase his revenue, he decided to contact Al Majmoua and acquire a loan. It would help him to purchase living room and bedroom furniture to sell. As for the future, he would like to expand his business and further increase his revenue in order to overcome the labels that were assigned to him by birth.

loans.use: to purchase living room and bedroom furniture to sell

loans.name: Ya Alimamy

texts.en:
This is 57-year-old Ya Alimamy.  She is married and has three children aged 26, 29 and 21 years. In 2008, Ya Alimamy established her business selling biscuits, provisions, drinks, and bread. She began her business because she never went to school and her parents chose that she would become a businesswoman to help support her family. 

Working 7 days a week and 10 hours a day, she earns about SLL 1,200,000 every month from this business. She would like a loan in the amount of SLL 3,000,000. Ya Alimamy requires a loan in order to buy more provisions for her business such as sardines, margarine, biscuits, bread and soft drinks. She hopes that this loan will enable her to increase her monthly profits by approximately SLL 500,000. 

Ya Alimamy continues to save her profits as planned. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To buy more provisions such as sardines, margarine, biscuits, bread and soft drinks.

loans.name: Stephen

texts.en:
Stephen has operated a retail shop business, selling household consumables like wheat flour, maize flour, and sugar. He faces a major challenge of stiff competition from other retail operators.The previous loan helped him to boost his business and he appreciates it much as he is now capable of meeting the needs of his family.

With the loan he is requesting he wants to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour. He decided to join Yehu to access loans to boost his business.

loans.use: to purchase sugar, rice, maize flour and wheat flour to sell.

loans.name: Helena J.

texts.en: Helena lives in West Point, one of the most populated and well-known markets in Montserrado County. She is 50 years old, and she is married with three children aged between 32 and 29. For two years now she has been operating a shop in her community where she sells rice, soap, oil, toothpaste, etc. She received a little money from her husband to start her business, and she learned this way of doing business from her mother. She likes her business because she makes more profit. She is requesting a loan to purchase more rice, soap, oil, toothpaste, etc. for her business. She hopes to build a dream house. She appreciates Kiva for supporting BRAC Liberia.

loans.use: to purchase more rice, soap, oil, toothpaste, etc. for her business.

loans.name: Akbar

texts.ru: Акбар является бизнесменом, проживающим в городе Душанбе. Он женат, ему 32 года. У него среднее специальное образование. В семье Акбара пятеро человек: он, его жена, отец, брат и невестка. Акбар уже 7 лет как занимается торговым бизнесом, которому он научился у своего отца. На рынке города Акбар арендует торговую точку, где он продает бижутерии, заколки, детские игрушки. Ему в бизнесе помогает его отец и брат. Это считается их семейным бизнесом и прибыль, получаемый с торговли является единственным источником их семейного дохода. Акбар  сейчас хочет увеличить ассортимент товаров, чтобы улучшить товарооборот. С такой целью он обратился за кредитом. Кредит позволит им продвинуть бизнес и получить хорошую прибыль. Дальнейшие планы Акбара - это расширение их семейного бизнеса.
texts.en: Akbar is a businessman who lives in the city of Dushanbe. He is 32 years old and married. He has specialized secondary education. Akbar's family consists of five people: himself, his wife, father, brother and sister-in-law. Akbar has been in the sales business for seven years which he learned from his father. He rents out a vendor space on the market where he sells accessories, hair clips, and children's toys. His father and brother help him in this business. It is their family business and the income from the sales is the only source of income for their family. Akbar wants to increase the variety of merchandise to increase sales. He has come for a loan with this purpose. The loan will let him move his business forward and get a good profit. Akbar's plans for the future include growing his family business.

loans.use: to buy accessories, hair clips, children's toys with the purpose of growing business.

loans.name: Dialabaton  I Group

texts.fr:
Les dix  membres du groupe DIALABATON  I sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 39 ans et ont en moyenne 4 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Kobili  un des villages de la commune de Guégnaka,  préfecture de Dioîla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont l’arachide, du mil et du haricot. Elles sont à leur septième  collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt,  Sitan la première personne à gauche dans le rang des assises, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 1 ha de mil et d’arachide 
Les productions sont vendues au niveau de la ville de Fana, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle espère réaliser un bénéfice moyen de 95 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The ten members of Dialabaton I Group are married women who average 39 years of age and four children. Most live in polygamous families in Kobili, one of the villages in Guégnaka,  a commune in Dioîla Prefecture, Koulikoro Region, second administrative region of Mali.

They work with Kiva's partner, the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, in order to better organize their activities at the start of the rainy season. The crops they grow are peanuts, millet, and beans. They are seeking their seventh loan from the MFI.

With this loan, Sitan (first woman on the left in the sitting row) intends to buy farm inputs, small tools, and pay for plowing to maintain approximately one hectare of millet and peanuts.

After the harvests, the production is sold in the town of Fana, to a clientele comprising both men and women. She hopes to turn an average profit of XOF 95'000 (ca US$ 190) per planting.

loans.use: to buy farm inputs, small tools, and pay for plowing

loans.name: Totiman Group

texts.fr: Mère de 06 enfants tous scolarisés, Taminane est cultivatrice de profession. Elle est née en 1967 et a pour conjoint un cultivateur. Son souhait est d’agrandir son activité et assurer le bien être de la famille c’est pour cela, elle demande un premier crédit à WAGES pour acheter des outils de travail afin de pouvoir atteindre ses objectifs. Elle est aidée par 05 personnes et en même temps responsable d’un groupement nommé TOTIMAN constitué de 02 femmes, d’un homme, ont mis leur foi en la terre et cultive du mais. Comme la responsable, les autres membres espèrent avoir un bon rendement et prendre soin de leur famille.
texts.en:
Taminane, born in 1967, is a professional cultivator. She's married to a cultivator and is the mother of six school-attending children.

She would like to expand her business and ensure her family's well being. This is why she's seeking her first loan from Kiva's partner, WAGES, in order to buy work tools and reach her goals.

She gets help from five other people and, at the same time, she's responsible for Totiman Group, which is made up of two women and one man. They put their faith in the land and grow corn.

Like Taminane, the other members of the group hope to get a good yield and take care of their family.

loans.use: to buy work tools

loans.name: Hassan

texts.en:
Hassan is a 45-year-old married father of five children. He owns a small business where he sets and fixes TV satellites. His wife is a housekeeper, and their combined revenue is very low despite having five children, four of who are enrolled in a public school. He decided to contact Al Majmoua and acquire a loan in order to purchase TV dishes and receivers to broaden his offerings and increase his revenue. 

As for the future, he would like to expand his business.

loans.use: to purchase TV dishes and receivers to broaden his offerings and increase his revenue.

loans.name: James

texts.en:
James is a married man with school-going children. They live at their own house that has electricity and piped water. His greatest monthly expenses are food and school fees.

For the past year, he has operated a goat meat selling business operating from the market where neighbours and passersby are potential customers. He faces a major challenge of seasonality in his place of operation.

With the Kshs 50,000 he wants to purchase 10 goats for sale to earn a living.

loans.use: to purchase 10 goats for sale to earn a living.

loans.name: Dialabaton Ii Group

texts.fr:
Les dix  membres du groupe DIALABATON II sont des femmes mariées avec une moyenne d’âge de 37 ans et ont en moyenne 4 enfants. Elles vivent la plupart dans des familles polygames à Kobili  un des villages de la commune de Guégnaka,  préfecture de Dioîla, région de Koulikoro, 2ème région administrative du mali.
Elles collaborent avec l’institution de micro finance Soro yiriwaso dans le but de pouvoir mieux organiser leurs activités en début d’hivernage. Les spéculations cultivées sont l’arachide, du mil et du haricot. Elles sont à leur septième  collaboration avec l’institution.
Avec ce prêt,  Djeneba la  personne au milieu  dans le rang des débout, compte acheter les intrants, les petits équipements et payer les frais de labour pour entretenir environs 1 ha de mil et d’arachide 
Les productions sont vendues au niveau de la ville de Fana, après les récoltes à une clientèle composée d’hommes et de femmes. Elle compte réaliser un bénéfice de 100 000F CFA environs par campagne.
texts.en:
The ten members of Dialabaton II Group are married women who average 37 years of age and four children. Most live in polygamous families in Kobili, one of the villages in Guégnaka, a commune in Dioîla Prefecture, Koulikoro Region, second administrative region of Mali.

They work with Kiva's partner, the MFI Soro Yiriwaso, in order to better organize their activities at the start of the rainy season. The crops they grow are peanuts, millet, and beans. They are seeking their seventh loan from the MFI.

With this loan, Djeneba (the woman standing in the middle on the photograph) intends to buy farm inputs, small tools, and pay for plowing to maintain approximately one hectare of millet and peanuts.

After the harvests, the production is sold in the town of Fana, to a clientele comprising both men and women. She hopes to turn an average profit of XOF 100'000 (ca US$ 200) per planting.

loans.use: to buy fertilizers, seeds, herbicide, small tools, and pay for plowing and weeding

loans.name: Teliba Group

texts.fr: Constitué de femmes et d’hommes tous dans le domaine de l’agriculture (culture du mais et du soja), ce groupement nommé TELIBA a pour responsable mr Pitéssam. Il est né en 1984 et père de 02 enfants âgés de 03ans et 06mois. Ils sollicitent ce premier prêt pour acheter des outils de travail. Le profit les aidera à améliorer leurs productions et à prendre soin de la famille. Notons que Pitéssam a démarré en 2005 son activité en REGION CENTRALE et  aidé par 01 personne.
texts.en:
Teliba Group is made up of women and men who are all farmers and grow corn and soy. Mr. Pitéssam is responsible for the group. He was born in 1984 and is the father of two children. One is 3 years old, the other is six months old.

The members of the group are seeking their first loan to buy work tools. The profits will help them improve their production and take care of their families.

It should be noted that Pitéssam started his business in 2005 in Central Region with the help of another person.

loans.use: to buy work tools

loans.name: Cumplidas Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Concepción mujer de 40 años de edad, soltera con dos hijos de 20 y 2 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de comida los fines de semanas almuerzos, buñuelos en su comunidad y la venta de ropa usada ambulante desde hace 4 años. Su hijo mayor le ayuda a distribuir la comida por encargo a los domicilios de su barrio, este crédito lo  invertirá en la compra de materia prima como arroz, azúcar, aceite, yucas, chicharrón, repollo, vinagre, carne de res, carne de pollo, hueso de res, plátanos verdes, plátanos maduros, chayote, ayote, quequisque, hierba buena, culantro, sal, leñas, tomate, cebolla, chiltoma, naranja agria etc. Yovania tiene 47 años y su negocio es la venta de comida a trabajadores del centro de salud que hay en su comunidad y Silvia tiene 51 años y su negocio es de una pulpería en su domicilio.
texts.en:
The group is made up of three entrepreneurial members.  One of these is Concepción, a 40 year old single woman with two children (20 and 2 years old).  Her business for four years has been selling food on weekends in her neighborhood serving lunch and buñuelo [a donut like sweet], as well as selling used clothing as a street vendor.  Her oldest son helps her deliver food orders to the residences in their neighborhood.  

She will invest this loan in the purchase of ingredients like rice, sugar, oil, yuca, pork rinds, cabbage, vinegar, beef, chicken, beef bones, green bananas, ripe plantains, chayote and ayote [types of squash], taro, mint, cilantro, salt, firewood, tomatoes, onion, sweet peppers, bitter oranges, etc.  

Yovania is 47 years old and her business is selling food to workers at a health care center in her community.  Silvia is 51 years old and her business is a general store run from her home.

loans.use: in the purchase of ingredients like rice, sugar, oil, yuca, pork rinds, cabbage, vinegar, beef, chicken, beef bones, green bananas, ripe plantains, chayote and ayote [squashes], taro, mint, cilantro, salt, firewood, tomatoes, onion, sweet pepper, bitter oranges, etc.

loans.name: Khurshed

texts.ru: Хуршеду 30 лет. У него есть жена, двое сыновей и одна дочь. Он проживает со своей семьей, а также с матерью и братом в городе Душанбе. Его жена работает учительницей, а дети учатся в школе. Хуршед в данное время нигде не работает. Раньше он работал водителем в гостинице города. Поэтому у него есть хороший водительский опыт. Теперь он собирается заняться собственным бизнесом в этой сфере и предоставлять услуги такси по маршрутной линии города. В столице почти все пользуются услугой такси и это прибыльный бизнес. У Хуршеда имеется сбережение в размере 4500 TJS, но этой суммы совсем мало, чтобы приобрести автомобиль. Для реализации цели Хуршед обратился за кредитом. На сумму кредита и сбережения он хочет купить автомобиль и начать деятельность. Благодаря кредиту у него будет собственный бизнес и хороший доход.
texts.en: Khurshed is 30 years old. He has a wife, two sons and one daughter. He lives with his family and also with his mother and brother in the city of Dushanbe. His wife works as a teacher and his children go to school. Khurshed does not work at this time. He used to work as a driver in the city's hotel and has a driving experience. Right now he wants to start his own business in this field and provide a taxi service on the local city route. Almost everyone takes a taxi in the capital city and it's a profitable business. Khurshed has savings in the amount of 4,500 TJS, but this is not enough to buy a car. To realize his goal Khurshed has come for a loan. He wants to buy a car and start his business using the savings and the loan. Thanks to the loan he will have his own business and good income.

loans.use: to buy a vehicle to provide a taxi service.

loans.name: Unidas Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias emprendedoras de éxito una de ella es Vilma tiene 54 años de edad, acompañada con un hijo a su cargo, su negocio es el destace de cerdo desde hace 7 años. Tiene de ser cliente de la institución 5 años, Su producto lo comercializa en el mercado. El crédito lo solicita para comprar cerdos, destazarlos y  posteriormente venderlos. Lilian es una mujer de 55 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de lácteos y Juana tiene 47 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos y ropa.
texts.en:
This group consists of three successful entrepreneurial members.  One of the women is Vilma who is 54 years old and is accompanied by a dependent child. Her business for the past seven years has been butchering pigs. She sells her products in the market. 

She has been a client of the institution for five years and is requesting this loan to buy pigs to butcher and then later sell.  Lilian is a 55 year old woman and her business is selling milk.  Juana is 47 years old and her business is selling cosmetics and clothing.

loans.use: to buy live pigs to butcher and later sell

loans.name: La Tormenta Group

texts.es: Es un grupo formado por cinco socias empresarias que cada una tiene su actividad económica, una de ella es María mujer de 33 años, acompañada, con cinco hijos menores desde hace 8 años se dedica a vender frutas y ropa ambulante en las calles de Masaya, una de sus hijas mayores le ayuda a vender sus productos, este crédito lo quiere invertir en la compra de ropa como pantalón de varón, pantalón de mujer, camisas de varón, blusas de dama, camisetas, chores, vestidos de damas etc. Mercedes es otra socia del grupo tiene 26 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de comida, María tiene 52 años y su negocio es la venta de tortilla y frito, María Elsa tiene 52 años y su negocio es una mini librería y Luz tiene 30 años de edad  y su negocio es la reparación de celular.
texts.en:
This group was formed by five partners, each entrepreneurs with their own type of business. One of these is María, who is 33 years old and has a partner and five minor children. For the past 8 years, she has been selling fruit and clothing as a street vendor in Masaya. One of her oldest daughters helps her sell her wares. She wants to invest this loan in the purchase of clothing such as men's pants, women's pants, men's shirts, women's blouses, t-shirts, shorts, dresses, etc. 

Mercedes is another member of the group; she is 26 years old and has a business selling food. María is 52 years old and sells tortillas and deep-fried snacks. María Elsa is 52 and has a mini bookstore. Luz is 30 years old and repairs cellular phones.

loans.use: to buy new clothing such as pants, dress shirts, t-shirts, shorts, dresses, etc. for men and women

loans.name: Yurem Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socias empresarias, una de ellas es Zulmira mujer de 28 años de edad, acompañada, con 3 hijos de 8, 6 años y 8 meses. Su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva. Tiene 5 años de ser cliente de la institución, ha demostrado ser una persona responsable en sus pagos. Este crédito lo invertirá en comprar más ropa como pantalones, camisas, blusas, faldas, toallas, calcetines, etc. Martha tiene 42 años de edad su negocio es la venta de ropa nueva y usada y Luz tiene 43 años de edad y su negocio es una pulpería.
texts.en:
The group is comprised of three women entrepreneurs, one of whom is Zulmira, 28, who lives with her common-law husband and three children, ages 8, 6 and 8 months.  She sells new clothing for a living and has been a client of the institution for five years, proving herself to be responsible in her loan payments.  She will use this loan to buy more clothing such as pants, shirts, blouses, skirts, towels, socks, etc.  

The other members are Martha, 42, who sells new and used clothing and Luz, 43, who is in the grocery business.

loans.use: To buy more clothing such as pants, shirts, blouses, skirts, towels, socks, etc.

loans.name: Sarvina

texts.ru: Сарвина молодая и умная женщина. Ей 20 лет. Она замужем, но еще не имеет детей. Она работает более 2 лет в Птицефабрике. Она работает птицеводом. Сарвина очень честная и добросовестная женщина и поэтому ее коллеги очень уважают ее. Сарвина кредитуется первый раз. Она нуждается в деньгах, так как ее мать серьёзно больна. Сарвина не имеет сбережения для того, чтобы купить лекарства для лечения матери. Она запрашивает займ на сумму 3000 Сомони для покупки лекарств. Этот займ поможет улучшению здоровья ее любимой матери. Она ждет вашу доброту.
texts.en: Sarvina is a young and smart woman. She is 20 years old. She is married, but does not have children yet. She has been working for over two years on a poultry farm as a aviculturist. Sarvina is a very honest woman and that's why her colleagues respect her. Sarvina is taking out the loan for the first time. She needs money because her mother is seriously ill. Sarvina does not have any savings to buy medicine to treat her mother. She is asking for a loan in the amount of 3,000 somoni to buy medicine. This loan will help improve her beloved mother's health. Sarvina is waiting for your kindness.

loans.use: to buy medicine for treatment of her beloved mother.

loans.name: Las Bellas Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por tres socias exitosas una de ellas es Ubenza mujer de 54 años de edad, soltera. Su negocio es venta de ropa, zapatos, accesorios sus productos los comercializa ambulante, en el mercado y su comunidad. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de zapatos  cerrados  varón y  mujer, sandalias, chapas, cadenas, pulseras, anillos, blusas, faldas, pantalones. Brenda tiene 45 y su negocio es salón de belleza y Mariana mujer de 49 años su negocio es salón de belleza.
texts.en:
This group is made up of three successful members, one of which is Ubenza, a single 54-year-old woman. She works selling clothing, shoes, and accessories. She sells her products in the street, in her community's market. 

She is applying for this loan in order to buy closed-toe men's and women's shoes, sandals, earrings, chains, bracelets, rings, blouses, skirts, and pants. 

Brenda is 45 years old and works in a beauty salon, and Mariana is 49 years old and also works in a beauty salon.

loans.use: to buy closed-toe men's and women's shoes, sandals, earrings, chains, bracelets, rings, blouses, skirts, and pants.

loans.name: Los Meneses Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado tres socias exitosas una de ellas es Migdalia mujer de 45 años de edad, casada con dos hijos de 19 y 14 años. Su negocio es una pulpería desde hace 8 años en su comunidad. El crédito lo solicita para la compra por quintal de arroz, frijoles, azúcar, caja de jabón de lavar ropa, jabón de baño, pamper, cigarros, chiveras, etc. Ileana mujer de 40 años, su negocio crianza y venta de cerdo, frijoles cocidos, hielo, frescos y Julia tiene 52 años de edad y su negocio es venta de tortillas, fresco y helados.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three successful members, one of whom is Migdalia, 45, who is married and has two children, ages 19 and 14.  For eight years she has been running a grocery store in her community.  She is requesting a loan to buy 100 lbs. of rice, beans, sugar, a case of detergent, bath soap, disposable diaspers, cigarettes, yogurts, etc.

The other members are Ileana, 40, who raises and sells pigs, cooked beans and ice, and Julia, 52, who has a tortilla, soft drinks and ice cream business.

loans.use: To buy 100 lbs. of rice, beans, sugar, a case of detergent, bath soap, disposable diapers, cigarettes, yogurt, etc.

loans.name: Estoy Confiando Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias una de ellas es Silvia mujer de 35 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos de 7 y 14 años de edad. Su negocio es venta de ropa usada desde hace 2 años. Tiene 1 año de ser cliente de la institución. El crédito lo solicita para la compra de pacas de ropa donde vienen camisas, pantalones de mujer y varón, shores, vestidos, bufandas, pantalones de vestir, etc. zelenia tiene 27 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de cabeza de chancho y Victoria mujer de 53 años de edad y su negocio es venta de sopa.
texts.en:
This group is comprised of three members, one of whom is Silvia.  She is 35, married and has two children, ages 7 and 14.  For two years she has been selling used clothing for a living.  She has been a client of the institution's for a year.  The loan she is requesting is to buy packs of clothing containing shirts, men's and women's pants, shorts, dresses, scarves, dress pants, etc.  

Another member, Zelenia, is 27 and sells pork and Victoria, 53, sells soup.

loans.use: To buy packs of clothing containing shirts, men's and women's pants, shorts, dresses, scarves, dress pants, etc.

loans.name: Ideal Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres mujeres emprendedoras una de ellas es Telma tiene 66 años de edad, casada, con dos hijos bajo su cargo de 23 y  20 años de edad. Se dedica al negocio de vender frutas y verduras variadas desde hace 30 años. Sus productos los comercializa  en el mercado. El crédito que solicita es para la compra de chayote, ayote, zanahoria, remolacha, papa, naranja, banano, melón, etc. Tania mujer de 24 años de edad, su negocio es la venta de ropa típica y Irene mujer de 42 años su negocio taller de costura.
texts.en:
The group is comprised of three women entrepreneurs, one of whom is Telma, 66, who is married and has two children, ages 23 and 20, in her care.  She sells a variety of fruits and vegetables and has been in business for 30 years, working at the market.  She is requesting a loan to buy chayotes, pumpkins, carrots, beets, potatoes, oranges, bananas, melons, etc.

The other members of the group are Tania, 24, who sells regional clothing, and Irene, 42, who has a sewing business.

loans.use: To buy chayotes, pumpkins, carrots, beets, potatoes, oranges, bananas, melons, etc.

loans.name: Las Sirenitas Group

texts.es: El grupo está formado por tres socios uno de ellos es Agustina tiene 45 años de edad, casada, con 7 hijos dos de ellos a su cargo de 16 y 14  años. Su negocio es la venta de frutas variadas desde hace 4 años. Es  cliente de la institución desde hace 8 años y el crédito lo solicita para invertir en compra de inventario de frutas como banano, naranja, melón, papaya, cosecha de mamon y fletes de leña. Bismak tiene 40 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de ropa en la zona franca y Ana mujer de 36 años y su negocio es la venta ambulante de frutas.
texts.en:
The group is comprised of three members, one of whom is Agustina who is 45, married and has seven children, two of whom are in her care, ages 16 and 14.  For four years she has been earning a living selling a variety of fruit.  For eight years she has been a client of the institution; and she plans to use the loan to buy fruit such as banana, orange, melon and papaya, and firewood.

The other two members are Bismak, 40, who sells clothing in the duty free zone and Ana, 36, who works as a street vendor selling fruit.

loans.use: To buy fruit such as banana, orange, melon, papaya, and firewood.

loans.name: Juana Del Carmen

texts.es: Juana es una mujer emprendedora exitosa de 44 años de edad, casada con un hijo menor de edad. Su negocio es pulpería, venta de ropa usada y nueva desde hace 18 años. Sus productos como la ropa nueva y usada la venden ambulante. El crédito lo invertirá en comprar bisutería tales como chapas, cadenas, collares, pulseras, anillos, aros, etc
texts.en:
Juana is a successful and entrepreneurial 44-year-old woman. She is married and has one younger child. Her businesses are in selling groceries and used and new clothing, which she has been doing for the past 18 years. She sells the new and used clothing on the street. 

She will invest this loan in the purchase of jewelry such as earrings, chains, necklaces, bracelets, rings, hoops, etc.

loans.use: to buy jewelry such as earrings, chains, necklaces, bracelets, rings, hoops, etc.

loans.name: El Arbol Group

texts.es: Este grupo está formado por cuatro socias empresarias una de ellas es Mirna que es mujer de 34 años, acompañada, con dos hijos de 10, 18 años respectivamente, su negocio es tener una pulpería en su domicilio desde hace dos años y medios, anteriormente era ama de casa, su mama le ayuda en el negocio, en la atención de la clientela. Este crédito lo invertirá en la compra de granos básicos como arroz, frijoles, azúcar, aceite, productos  lácteos, sal, medicamentos populares, papel higiénico, productos tang, carne de res, carne de pollo, gaseosas variadas, bigcola, pan simple, pan dulce etc. Uno de los logros que adquirió con el crédito anterior es con sus utilidades hizo un muro perimetral en su domicilio que le da seguridad a su familia., Maritza tiene 40 años y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, Eugenia tiene 21 años su negocio es la venta de pozol, tistes, semilla de jícaro en bruto y Margot tiene 62 años y su negocio es la venta de sandalias.
texts.en: This group is made up of four businesswomen.  One of these members is 34-year-old Mirna.  She has a partner and two children, aged ten and eight years old.  Mirna has had a grocery store in her home for two and a half years.  Before starting this work, she was a housewife.  Mirna's mother helps her with the business, serving customers.  This loan will be used to buy basic products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, dairy products, salt, medicines, toilet paper, Tang products, meat, chicken, fizzy drinks, Cola, bread, sweet bread and more.  One thing that Mirna has managed as a result of previous loans is that she has built a wall around her home, providing her family with more security.  Martiza is 40 years old and has a business selling Avon cosmetics.  Eugenia is 21 years old and sells "posol" (a maize drink) and seeds for calabash tress.  Margot is 62 years old and has a business selling watermelons.

loans.use: to buy basic products such as rice, beans, sugar, oil, dairy products, salt, medicines, toilet paper, Tang products, meat, chicken, fizzy drinks, Cola, bread, sweet bread and more.

loans.name: Yojana De Los Angeles

texts.es: Yojana es una mujer emprendedora de 36 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos  de 18, 14 y 6 años de edad. Su negocio es una pulpería desde hace 7 años. Tiene 1 año de ser cliente de esta institución. El crédito solicitado es para compra por quintal los granos básicos como arroz, azúcar, aceite, papel higiénico, jabón de baño, jabón de ropa, cigarros, chiverías, etc.
texts.en: Yojana is an entrepreneurial woman who is 36 years old, married, and has three children who are 18, 14, and 6 years old. She has run a grocery store for the past seven years. She has been a member of this institution for one year. The loan for which she is applying will be used to buy per hundredweight basic grains (such as rice), sugar, oil, toilet paper, bathroom soap, clothing soap, cigarettes, canned goods, etc.

loans.use: to buy per hundredweight basic grains (such as rice), sugar, oil, toilet paper, bathroom soap, clothing soap, cigarettes, canned goods, etc.

loans.name: El Cisne Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por cuatros socias emprendedoras, así es el caso de Mirna mujer de 54 años de edad, acompañada, con cuatro hijos, se dedica a la hecha y venta de nacatamales desde hace 8 años que junto a su esposo ambos están inmerso en el negocio que les ha ayudado a sostener a  la familia, tiene dos años de ser cliente de la institución, el crédito  lo quiere invertir en un nuevo negocio como es la venta de fritanga y materia prima para  la fritanga como carne de res, carne de pollo, plátanos verdes, plátanos maduros, aceite, tomate, chiltoma, cebollas, sal, arroz, azúcar, bolsas plásticas, y materia prima para los nacatamales como carne de cerdo, hojas de chagüites, sal, achiote, maíz, papa, tomate, chiltoma, cebolla, ajo, mecate, leñas, cal etc. con el crédito anterior logro con sus utilidades en reparar el techo de su casa mejoras a su vivienda. Marisol tiene 44 años su negocio es la venta de ropa y calzados, Karla tiene 18 años y su negocio es la venta de cosméticos de la Avon, bisuterías y ropa nueva de adulto.
texts.en: This group is made up of four enterprising members, including 54-year-old Mirna.  She has a partner and four children and has been making a living producing and selling “nacatamales” (rice and corn wrapped in a banana leaf) for eight years.  Mirna, and her husband, have been immersed in this business which has helped them to support their family.  Mirna has been a member of the communal bank for two years and wants to invest this loan in a new business – a restaurant – and to buy supplies such as meat, chicken, green bananas, ripe bananas, oil, tomatoes, onion, salt, rice, sugar, plastic bags and supplies for making “nacatamales” such as pork, banana leaves, salt, annatto, corn, potatoes, tomatoes, onion, garlic, cord, firewood and more.  With her previous loan, Mirna used her profits to repair the roof in her house.  Marisol is 44 years old and has a business selling clothes and footwear.  Karla, 18 years old, has a business selling Avon products, costumer jewellery and new clothes for adults.

loans.use: to start a new business – a restaurant – and to buy supplies such as meat, chicken, green bananas, ripe bananas, oil, tomatoes, onion, salt, rice, sugar, plastic bags and supplies for making “nacatamales” (a rice and meat dish, wrapped in a banana leaf) such as pork, banana leaves, salt, annatto, corn, potatoes, tomatoes,  onion, garlic, cord, firewood and more.

loans.name: Nicole Group

texts.es: Grupo formado por tres socias emprendedoras una de ellas es Liliam mujer de 47 años de edad, casada, con tres hijos su negocio es la venta de comida todos los días en su domicilio quien las vende a la comunidad, desde hace 10 años. Tiene ser cliente de la institución 6 años consecutivos y los créditos les ha servido para mantener y mejorar su negocio, este crédito lo invertirá en la compra en materia prima como arroz, azúcar, frijoles, aceite, carne de res, carne de pollo, pescado, sal, verduras, vegetales, plátano verde, plátano maduro, cremas, mantequillas, salsa de tomate, salsa inglesa, mayonesa, pimienta, tortillas, leñas etc. En el préstamo pasado con sus ganancias logro comprar dos peroles grandes para cocinar. Flor tiene 33 años de edad y su negocio es la venta de moronga, fritos, chicharrón en su domicilio y Rosa tiene 30 años y su negocio es la venta de frijoles cocidos, gaseosas, queso.
texts.en:
This group consists of three entrepreneurial members, one of whom is Liliam, a 47-year-old married woman with three children. She has worked selling food from her home every day to people in her community for the past 10 years. She has been a member of this group for six consecutive years and the loans have served her well in order to maintain and improve her business.

She will invest this loan in the purchase of raw materials such as rice, sugar, beans, oil, beef, chicken, fish, salt, vegetables, green and ripe bananas, cream, butter, tomato sauce, Worcestershire sauce, mayonnaise, pepper, tortillas, firewood, etc. With the earnings she gained with her last loan, she was able to buy two large cooking pots. 

The other members of the group are Flor, who is 33 years old and sells blood sausage, fried foods, and pork rinds from her home, and Rosa, who is 30 years old and who sells cooked beans, soda, and cheese.

loans.use: purchase basic items such as rice, beans, sugar, cooking oil, beef, and chicken, as well as kitchen utensils such as skewers, ladles, frying pans, etc.

loans.name: David Ernesto

texts.es:
David es un joven luchador de 21 años de edad, acompañado y padre de dos hijos. Desde hace 5 años se dedica a la reparación de motos y bicicletas; ya que nunca tubo la ayuda de su padre y a sido su madre quien se encargo de criarlo toda la vida.   El  oficio lo aprendió de manera empírica, ya que cerca de donde el vivía, estaba ubicado un pequeño taller, y todas las tardes llegaba a observar como era que realizaban las labores de trabajo. De esta manera al ver la insistencia  que el muchacho tenia, cierto día le dieron la oportunidad de dejarlo laborar en el taller. así  fue como aprendió y hace dos años coloco su propio taller, donde actualmente labora.  Con los pocos ingresos que obtiene compra los materiales en la ciudad, en una tienda reconocida en ventas al por mayor de repuestos y herramientas.

El préstamo que esta solicitando a Fundación Campo, es para comprar llantas de bicicletas y de moto, porque no tiene disponible para sus clientes solo las repara peor no teine a la venta para cambiarlas,  rines, quiere vender chasis de bicicletas de esto no vende en este momento. De esta manera,   mejorara y equipara su pequeño negocio. Ya que lo que quiere es poder brindar una mejor atención y servicio a sus clientes.

Dado a que va mejor las condiciones de su negocio e invertirá en la compra de mejor calidad de repuestos.  David espera atraer muchos mas clientes con los que cuenta actualmente, y así generar una mayor cantidad de ingresos, con los cuales espera darle una mejor calidad de vida a sus hijos.

Los planes de David  es primeramente cancelar el préstamo y seguir teniendo la oportunidad de nuevos prestamos en la institución. Otro es darle a sus hijos la oportunidad de estudiar una carrera universitaria, ya que el nunca tubo esa posibilidad, debido a que no tubo la ayuda de su padre. Y desea poder ver  crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
David is a tenacious young man, 21 years old, with a partner and two children. For 5 years he has been repairing motorcycles and bicycles. He never had the help of his father, and it was his mother who raised him all his life. He learned the trade empirically, as near where he lived there was a small workshop, and every afternoon he went to watch how the work was done. Seeing the boy's persistence, one day they gave him the opportunity to work in the shop. This is how he learned, and two years ago he started his own workshop, where he now works. With the little income he earns, he buys materials in the city, at a shop known for wholesale parts and tools. 

The loan he is requesting from Fundación Campo is to purchase bicycle and motorcycle tires, because he does not have them available for his clients; he repairs them but does not have them for sale to be able to change them. He will also buy rims. He would like to sell bicycle frames, which he does not sell at the moment. This way, he will improve and equip his small business. What he wants is to be able to provide better service to his customers. 

Once his business conditions improve he will invest in the purchase of better quality replacement parts. David hopes to attract many more clients through those he currently has, and thus generate more income, with which he hopes to provide a better quality of life for his children. 

David's plan is first to pay off the loan and continue to have the opportunity for new loans with the institution. Another is to give his children the chance to get a university degree, since he never had that chance, due to the lack of assistance from his father. He would also like to see his business grow.

loans.use: to buy bicycle and motorcycle tires, rims, and bicycle frames

loans.name: Les Prodiges De Dilaire 1, 2, 3, 4 & 5 Group

texts.fr:
